description: Gets a group profile in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the group profile exists.

parameters.name: groupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the group profile.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the group profile exists.

nested_items.name: groupName
nested_items.description: The name of the group for which the specified group profile exists.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the group profile.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The identifier of the group profile.
